Key Match Events: Kusal Perera and Kusal Mendis arrived at the crease in the Super Over but Sri Lanka scored only 2 runs.
Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav won the match for India in the Super Over.
Sri Lanka tied the score at 137 in the last over but lost in the Super Over.
Pre-Game Insights: India defeated Sri Lanka by 43 runs on 27 July and then by 7 wickets on 28 July, winning the series 3-0.
Shubman Gill could not play due to an injury and Sanju Samson was given the chance.
It is still uncertain if Gill would play in the upcoming match.
Post-Match Reflections: India's Suryakumar Yadav-led team clinched the three T20I-match series against Sri Lanka by 3-0.
India also won the series with this win.
Sri Lanka's Kusal Perera (46) and Kusal Mendis (43) played stable knocks but others could not score more than 10 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a 23% chance of precipitation on Tuesday with a 97% likelihood of cloud cover.
The temperature is expected to hover around 22 degrees Celsius, with strong gusts of wind reaching speeds of up to 33 km/h.
The live telecast of the match will be on Sony Sports Network while SonyLIV will provide the live streaming.
